subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the fifth, after pretending to be hit by a pitch and then being called back into the batter’s box, Bird drew a walk. In the seventh, after the Orioles had tied the game, he hit a three-run shot.
snippet: In the fifth, after pretending to be hit by a pitch and then being called back into the batter’s box, Bird drew a walk. In the seventh, after the Orioles had tied the game, he hit a three-run shot.
